qas.question: The United Nations Organization and UNICEF felt the relay could be used as what?
North Korea is often listed among the worst offenders in the world in what regard?
What is the children's agency of the United Nations Organization?
What is the mission of the organizations?

answers.text: raising awareness of conditions for children

qas.question: Who is often listed amongst the world's worst offenders when it comes to human rights?

context: The United Nations Organization and its children's agency <a2_0>UNICEF<a2_0/> withdrew <a3_0>their staff<a3_0/>, saying that it wasn't sure the event would help its mission of <a4_0>raising awareness of conditions for children<a4_0/> and amid concerns that the relay would be used as <a0_0>a propaganda stunt.<a0_0/> "It was unconscionable," said a UN official who was briefed on the arguments. <a5_0>North Korea<a5_0/> is frequently listed among the world’s worst offenders <a1_0>against human rights.
